website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung MV800 compact camera has a fun flip-out screen that makes it easy to take self portraits, but it falls short in terms of image quality and low-light performance.

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills Promises!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little camera. The picture quality is excellent even in 10mp. Video quality is way better than my previous camera. It is beyond easy to use with minimal buttons, touch screen and automatic or custom setting that are easy to access. Battery life is so much better than my old camera that would easily open and run it's battery down doing nothing. The screen is large and though I haven't used the flip screen much it IS useful. This could not be an easier camera to use....glad I bought when I did cause the new price is higher!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my red camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a professional and 5 other brand hand held cameras. This Samsung Multiview is by far the best, it is fun to use and the price is right. The quality is great, the features are fun and menu easy to use. I would buy this camera for my niece, perfect for teens and myself (a young girl at heart) Not for professional photos but it does take great portraits. "Beauty Shot" feature is my favorite, perfect for smoothing out blemishes and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: I take this camera with me everywhere. Once you get used to all the features is provides you'll never want to take pictures with your phone again. The fact that I can edit my photos while they are still on the camera makes it that much better. The touch screen is easy to use and customizable. The only issue that I have is that this phone definitely takes a better outside photo than and inside photo, but that just takes a little adjustment to the settings if you know where to look.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maloy

customer_reviews.title: This camera was everything and more
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera cause I have been in search of an affordable camera that had a flip out screen. I make youtube videos and I must say I am impressed my viewers can see my products and videos a lot better and it really does the job as far as me being able to make videos and see exactly what I am doing. I like the pictures as well as far as I am concerened they are of good quality. Another thing that I enjoy about the camera is thyou can pause is that when I am filming I can pause instead of having to stop and make a new video.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Performs awfully in low light.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really not a good idea. When the LCD is flipped up for selfies it is very difficult to hold the camera steady while pressing the shutter button. The shutter button is poorly placed. The camera performs very poorly in low light. It will let you down if you rely on it as your go to camera. I have missed once in a lifetime photo ops because this camera locks up in low light.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for its size, really easy to tote around on vacation. Photos print very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Self shots are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take some self portraits and shots of me and my SO. It is a great little camera, the pictures turn out beautifully and I am 110% satisfied. You get used to navigating through the menu to change the photo settings. I'm glad I purchased this camera. BTW it is cheaper on ebay. I should have checked ebay first.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Light Shadow

customer_reviews.title: STILL GOING STRONG!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A REALLY NICE CAMERA, AND WITH ALL OF THE OPTIONS IT HAS, AS WELL AS THE SIZE, IM HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. I USE THE CAMERA MAINLY FOR SELLING ITEMS ON EBAY, AND ITS REALLY EASY TO CONNECT AND USE. I ALSO LIKE THE TOUCH SCREEN--NOT TOO SENSITIVE, YET NOT TOO HARD TO PRESS AND GET THE MENU YOU WANT.
customer_reviews.author: W. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: A very neat, lightweight camera. The flip screen allows for great self shots. The resolution is also fantastic. The other features are good, though I haven't fiddled too much with them but the touch-up function saves some time from having to upload onto a PC using another software. Lovely purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Fine I suppose.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just 'ok'. Not the greatest pictures as the quality or resolution is a bit grainy. Video isn't so great either, very grainy output. But for simple basic stuff, it's adequate. Love the flip screen though so that makes up for a lot of its downfalls. (Yes, the lens is clean.)
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: So awesome and versatile! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome and versatile! Takes great, high color photographs. Charges with my phone charger in the car and at home....LOVE THIS THING! The Magic Frame feature lets you superimpose faces of friends onto other things like magazine covers and the moon over an ocean! I use this more than my bulky Nikon to document my child's every step. That's the truth. Also, the flip top feature makes for much much easier photos of yourself, and the pose guise feature helps those of us who aren't so great and striking the appropriate poses...lol
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bailey Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, completely satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: I really love the little screen - its perfect for me. The unit will sit a tripod and everyone at work has been using it with a mini-pod to take self portraits for the company collaboration site. One weekend I took it to the river for some Winter water photography to see if it makes as good an outdoor shot under stressful weather - worked like a charm even after several hours in sub-freezing morning walkabout. Battery life is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H Kelly

customer_reviews.title: touch screen is numb, make your taking pictures slow
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen is so numb; and you need to pick the photo environment options on screen, so sometime it makes you go freak for you cannot switch sharply. not water proof (although it's not on product specs), just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pictures & videos are really fuzzy/blurry-NOT GOOD QUALITY..I'm VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: photo
customer_reviews.text: compact with lots of options. Takes some time to learn all the options. Not that easy to take pictures with screen in up position. Quality of pictures in dark areas or people in motion, not the best.
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this for my birthday and I love it! it is very awesome. The back of it flips up and you can see yourself taking a picture. It is the most awesome camera I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: RnD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: having the flip monitor feature is fantastic; however the quality of video is blurry and sub par. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roses Revealing Reviews

customer_reviews.title: You must have it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera at a very low price for it's specifications, for those that take pictures in important events, very easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Andres Mejia Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera it takes very sharp pictures. I have not used all the different features yet. I've decided to use a different feature once a week. I've stopped using my phone camera, cause this is so much better. Plus when I'm on vacation I don't like to be bother with phone calls. Now when on vacation I lock my phone up in my hotel room and enjoy my new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Latti

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Small camera but has many features. nice for traveling and camping. strong one, it falled down and I thout that it is breaked. but it is still working propably
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad S. Alquraish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. The touch screen is nice and I like to be able to rotate the viewer. The zoom works well and it takes very nice pictures. I liked it so much my wife got one for her mother for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Robie

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera , you should all get one .. its a great birthday present , i make all my youtube videos on here and it takes great pictures :)
customer_reviews.author: DianeAudrey

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and much better then my last camera. I like the screen that you can flip up.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product and the transaction
customer_reviews.author: Martinez Portilla Jorge David

customer_reviews.title: BUENO
customer_reviews.text: MUY BUEN VENDEDOR LA MERCANCIA LLEGO EN BUEN ESTADO GRACIAS POR SUS SERVICIOS MUY AMABLES LO RECOMIENDO AL 100 %
customer_reviews.author: francy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far im happy with this purchase. I bought this camera because i need 1 for my vacations trip and i must say, really love the flip lcd. The only con i found is the pictures taken at night are not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos K.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I AM VERY HAPPY EITH THIS PRODUCT, I NEEDED A GREAT CAMERA FOR MAKING THE BEST PICTURES AND WITH THIS ONE I THINK I OBTEINED WHAT I WAS WAITING FOR, I HAVE MADE SOME PICTURES BUT I AM REALLY SATISFIED WITH THE VIDEO QUALITY, THE HIGH DEFINITION RECORDING IS EXCELLENT...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: While I thought it was a little shady that it came with no memory card, which I ended up having to buy extra, I figured that was my fault for not reading the fine print better. But all I can say is wow what a dream to use and what fantastic picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: I have to play with it a lil
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, the zoom, it does take great pictures but I am a MUA and I take pictures of my models displaying my work more than likely. I tried using the beauty shot function multiple times and it almost never recognizes the face and does not take good pictures
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: nice camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: best digital camera outhere!!! fort hat price!!! clear picture! easy to use! fun, unique style!, you will love this! samsung did it!
customer_reviews.author: RIC

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Qulaity is bad. Audio is bad .. Un happy with my purchase 130$ down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really good, es very easy to use it and have a lot of functions, it arrive very fast and in perfect conditions
customer_reviews.author: pau

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Camera started to freeze on me continuously. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG MV800CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THIS GREAT LITTLE CAMERA FOR QUITE SOME TIME AND IT HAS NEVER FAILED TO GIVE ME EXCELLENT RESULTS, I WOULD DEFINITLEY RECOMMEND IT TO ANY SHUTTER BUG.
customer_reviews.author: William P Gavin

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal and it's a very amazing camera. I bought it for a friend. Now, I just wanna one for me...
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Fevry Elisma

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: We had no problem with the product and even with the delivery. The machine can several resources so that flex not found very good which harms for night shots.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Alice Fragoso dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Samsung MV800
customer_reviews.text: This camera is more awesome than what I expected.It has so many features, crystal clear quality pictures.Its auto focus mode is awesome , many more mode like beauty mode , close up mode add more add stars to this product.
customer_reviews.author: MOGLI

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a compact camera for point and shoot purpose which we could take to parties and gatherings (Mainly for indoors). Pictures taken in day light are tolerable i suppose. But the ones taken at night were horrible. Plus point is that it has a lot of filters. But You can edit you pics in any photo editors that are available for free these days! We returned it as our old cannon (point and shoot)gives better results than this one.
customer_reviews.author: chandana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: well the camera got to me a day early and I am very pleased with the options it has and the quality of the pictures THIS THING IS GREAT u can see wrinkles on peoples faces they didnt even know they had
customer_reviews.author: J.J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Conditons, lack of Full description
customer_reviews.text: The camera was in perfect conditions: absolutely new, it match with the established aspects in the web page description, but in my opinion, it could have given more details about the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Yenniffer Rojas

customer_reviews.title: doesn't worth the money:( terrible..
customer_reviews.text: this item it says new but when i received it, it doesn't looks new to me. it seems like used item and this camera quality is poor it frozen all the time so i have to power off take off the battery then put back on. .... which is suck, i am just lazy to return it by the way if i return it they will be charge me 15% for restocking/returned fee. so i just keep it, i hope i didn't purchase this camera so wasting money...
customer_reviews.author: christal

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. It doesn't take long to understand and navigate the touch screen. My family thinks that the flip screen function is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jara

customer_reviews.title: unhappy with firewall llc.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my camera and it does not work. The battery doesnt take a charge and when I press the power button it tells me that there is no battery inserted! I am a tech geek and have experience with similar cameras. this is very unusual. but dont expect any help if you purchase from firewall llc. There is no way to personally contact them. the best you can get is a refund from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: b. lance

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Multiview MV800
customer_reviews.text: Best camera ever, i like it, very fast and small, I purchased this camera as a gift for my brother, perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: R<P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for people like to take selfies... but pixel is not satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: SXpear

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: picture quality great. love it. it is light ang manageable. great buy. reccommed product. i llllove ittttt. go samsung. great
customer_reviews.author: Sexxy💕💕💕

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Its good I like it . So far I had no problems with it. If you are considering it, just go for it .
customer_reviews.author: Todor Popov

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cheap and smart. Very convenient purchase. But don't have wifi. That's all. I recommend to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jose luis

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera SUCKS!!! It boasts similar quality to same class nikon and canon models but NOT EVEN CLOSE!!! The reaction speed is the SLOWEST I have ever seen on a camera. I have missed countless shots of my kids at their cutest because of this piece of trash. Everytime I pick it up Im upset with it. Looking for a decent river to toss it in.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Even someone like I who has small hands was afraid to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small. Even someone like I who has small hands was afraid to hold it because I couldn't get a good grasp without feeling like I was gonna drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little camera
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact and slim... perfect size to fit in a clutch purse or back pocket for the non-professional photographer on the go. Can't wait to travel with this camera! Very happy with this purchase, and speedy shipment!
customer_reviews.author: Harpist

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Phone Ever ... The flip screen feature is fantastic. Saves so much time when you can get it right the first time. No idea why this is not the industry standard. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zenas Zelotes

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera and tried it out...overall I like the flipping part, but the quality isn't what I've expected. I rather get a canon camera. Thanks Samsung, you guys are good with phones, but not this, yet. :D
customer_reviews.author: Nong Xiong

customer_reviews.title: It is a good digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: As a digital camera, it has much higher cost-performance than Casio TRYX..It has 5X optical zoom..However, sometimes it couldn't find my face..That is a problem that makes me felt a little bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beckybei

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this camera. I only have 3 photos in it and the memory full came on.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lane Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got my camera within the delivery time. I am happy so far with my purchase. ANd it was 30 dollars less than everywhere else. The camera allows me to record myself take picture of what I want without asking people to take it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanou

customer_reviews.title: White lines on display panel
customer_reviews.text: Several vertical white lines on display panel indicating spoilt pixels. The package looks really old. In workable condition and too lazy to send back for exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The phone functions fine and takes good pictures. The only thing that kinda bothered me was it didn't come with a simple case or pouch to put it in. Screens can be damaged without something.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Pickering Jr.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: 3d pics and panaroma features are awesome. pics are superb! i like the flip out part too, u never cut ur own head off!
customer_reviews.author: mamie

product_meta.title: Samsung Multiview MV800 16.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe 3.0-Inch Flip-Out Display lets you take and view great pictures from multiple angles. Easily adjust the LCD from 0 to 180 degrees and make any shot possible. Snap a picture over a crowd or get waist-level candid's of kids and pets, or spin the display for perfectly framed self-portraits. Choose from 3 shutter options to comfortably snap pics from any position.
feature_bullets: Shoot Every View From Any Angle, Groundbreaking Adjustable LCD Screen
Crisp, Colorful Images and Video, Sleek and Stylish
Perfect Panorama, Stunning 3D Images, Zoom Noise Reduction
CCD Image Sensor, Schneider Lens, Dual Image Stabilization
Micro SD Card Required (NOT INCLUDED), Approximately 10MB Internal Memory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars98 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
